room_title: Escape room "The Submarine" by Last Minute Escape in New York
review: We just finished the Submarine Room in Montclair. We're a family of 2 adults and 2 kids (9 and 12). The room was challenging but we made it just in time. It's very well done and we all loved it. You really need to bring multiple clues from different areas together in this one to be able to move on and get out. You also really have to work together in order to be successful. Afterwards the guy who ran it was available to answer all our questions. We recommend this room by all means!

room_title: Escape room "The Submarine" by Last Minute Escape in New York
review: I love this escape room company! They are always so kind and helpful. The Submarine honestly challenged us more than any of the previous experiences but every room is a lot of fun and worth every penny!

room_title: Escape room "The Submarine" by Last Minute Escape in New York
review: Very fun escape room! Submarine theme is very well thought out. Lots of teamwork required. Very funny and helpful staff. Could have been harder though....

room_title: Escape room "The Submarine" by Last Minute Escape in New York
review: They did an excellent job setting up the escape room. We had so much fun and cant wait to do the next one!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Submarine" by Last Minute Escape in New York
review: I've done several before and this was my favorite! It was completely immersive and had amazing challenges! I can't wait to go back!
